article.title: Northrop Grumman Systems Corporation Wins Contract from Wright-Patterson Air Force Base
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corporation has been awarded a cost plus fix fee contract of $20,842,119 from the Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, to develop and mature critical technologies required to enable airborne stand-off electronic attack, including low band, high-power transmitting phased arrays; mid-band high-power transmitting arrays; and advanced exciters.
